Method.name: GetProject
Method.Implementation: #dim st AS %Status=$$$OK s pObject=##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() s pObject.Project=##class(%ListOfDataTypes).%New() s res=##class(%ResultSet).%New("Studio.FileView:ProjectItems") s st= res.Execute(Name) while res.Next(){ s tObj=##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() s tObj.Name=res.Get("Name") s tObj.Type=res.Get("Type") s st= pObject.Project.Insert(tObj) } s st=pObject.%ToJSON() q st
